content.text: table is designed to store transaction data related to net-zero billing activities for Con Edison accounts. This table captures both the original and cancellation transactions, including billing periods, account numbers, and various metrics such as therms and CCF (hundred cubic feet). The table is structured to support the tracking and management of billing adjustments and cancellations, which are critical for accurate financial reporting and customer billing.
The complexity of this table is considered medium due to the following factors:
It contains multiple columns with default values and user-defined functions, indicating some level of business logic embedded within the table.
The presence of both original and cancellation metrics adds to the complexity, as it requires careful handling of data integrity and consistency.
The table has a primary key and is likely involved in relationships with other tables, although foreign keys are not explicitly defined here.
